doc.title: Duniya bɛɛ ka sigicogo
doc.checkedUseSetting: Aw ye a lajɛ walasa ka nin sigida in baara.
doc.excludeDomains: Domani tɔgɔw fara a kan walasa ka bɔ yen.

example.domain: Aw bɛ se ka domani tɔgɔ dɔ fara a kan, i n’a fɔ {{url}}, walasa ka domani tɔgɔ bɛɛ bɔ kɛnɛ kan.
example.url: I bɛ se ka jɛgɛn kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw bɔ kɛnɛ kan ni jɛgɛnsira dɔ farali ye, i n’a fɔ {{url}}.
example.glob: Aw bɛ se ka {{glob}} misali dɔ fara a kan, i n’a fɔ {{minimatch}}, walasa ka bɛnkan fuw sɔrɔ.

doc.script: Aw bɛ se fana ka baara kɛ ni js sɛbɛnniw ye walasa ka kunnafoni-falen-falen caman sɔrɔ.
doc.checkedUseScript: Ni i bɛna i ka sɛbɛnnikɛlan baara, i k’a kɔlɔsi ko i ka kan ka o yɔrɔ fila bɛɛ lajɛ waati kelen na walasa ka sɛbɛnni daminɛ.

example1.commentTitle: Sisan {{youtube}} siti kan, i ka kan ka {{youtube}} ka {{watch}} walima {{shorts}} ɲɛ da wuli tab kura kɔnɔ.
example1.introVariables: Dajirali fɛn caman b’a la ka fɛn caman sɛmɛntiya
example1.page: : Yɛlɛma in ye sisan ɛntɛrinɛti yɔrɔ URL fɛn ye Walasa ka kunnafoni wɛrɛw sɔrɔ, <a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/URL' target='_blank' rel='noreferrer'> Aw ye a lajɛ</a >
example1.pageHost: : Sisan ɛntɛrinɛti yɔrɔ in ka domɛni tɔgɔ
example1.isSameSubDomain: {{isSameSubDomain}}: Domani tɔgɔ kelen de y’a kɔlɔsi ko hali ni {{youtube}} ni {{families}} ka domani tɔgɔba fila bɛɛ ye {{mainDomain}} ye, domani tɔgɔw ye {{youtubeSubDomain}} ani {{ familiesSubDomain}} kelen-kelen bɛɛ la.
example1.clickpath: : Jɛɲɔgɔnya min digilen don, o sira
example1.minimatch: : {{glob}} bɛnkan fɛɛrɛ, ka baara kɛ ni {{minimatch}} gafemarayɔrɔ ye, baarakɛcogo fɛɛrɛ N b'aw deli Aw ye lajɛ, walima aw bɛ se ka {{glob}} baaracogo ɲini.
example1.rightTab: : Jɛɲɔgɔnya bɛ da wuli tab kura kɔnɔ kinin fɛ
example1.wholeCode: Kode bɛɛ kɔrɔ ye ko sisan YouTube ka {{www}} domani tɔgɔ ɲɛ kan, ni jɛgɛnsira digilen ye domani tɔgɔ kelen ye ani ni sira bɛ daminɛ ni {{watch}} walima {{shorts}} ye, o tuma na tab kura ɲɛ min bɛ kinin fɛ, o bɛna kɛ Open ye.
